channel.title: Is there a way to downgrade my wow client?
channel.description: I have my wow client @ 2.4. something or other and i need it to go back to 2.3 is there possible a way of doing this? i tried re-installing 2.3 patch and that said your client is too new

item.title: Is there a way to downgrade my wow client?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

delete patch.mpq, will downgrade all the way, and need to be repatched to the version you want, may take some time to repair but its the only way i know that works.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to downgrade my wow client?

item.title: Is there a way to downgrade my wow client?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:7, topic:216892”]do what the above said.
If you want to have different patches and be able to play on different servers without wasting your time, copy your wow folder, damage it, keep different patches on each.[/quote]
i need to waste extra hardrive space because…

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a way to downgrade my wow client?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:3, topic:216892”]i already have TBC installed i’ve set the repair utility going hopefully i will not need to install tbc again after this because i don’t have the disc
edit: the repair didnt downgrade it just reset the file still 2.4 anyone else got suggestions?[/quote]
Delete some importain files before using the Repair thing like WoW.exe I think should help.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a way to downgrade my wow client?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

i already have TBC installed i’ve set the repair utility going hopefully i will not need to install tbc again after this because i don’t have the disc
edit: the repair didnt downgrade it just reset the file still 2.4 anyone else got suggestions?

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to downgrade my wow client?

item.title: Is there a way to downgrade my wow client?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Damage your WoW instalation and use the repair program, that will downgrade it to 2.0, so then its just to reinstall 2.3 patch.
Or install TBC, that will also downgrade WoW to 2.0.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to downgrade my wow client?
